title: TextOak Watch Face
summary: BL3CK FACE: Classic Analog watch face for android Wear
description: Your life in time with this modern and classy piece of smart watch making. This analog watch face for Android Wear takes elements of classic timepieces and combines them with futuristic smartwatch functionality and design. Optimized for Round and Square watches (tested on LG GWatchR, LG GWatch, Asus ZenWatch, Moto360)Android Wear 5.0x CompliantWatch face features:★ Time (Analog and Digital dial)★ Customizable text logos in background (via companion app)★ AM/PM selector (via companion app)★ Date, day★  Dimmed mode almost the same as normal viewMore•  Visit our exclusive Android Wear faces collection for Android Wear on the Play Store•  Please let us know if you like to have any other faces (analog, digital or both) to be added to our selection. Designed and crafted in Italy by Stefano&Riccardo
descriptionHTML:
Your life in time with this modern and classy piece of smart watch making. This analog watch face for Android Wear takes elements of classic timepieces and combines them with futuristic smartwatch functionality and design.
Optimized for Round and Square watches (tested on LG GWatchR, LG GWatch, Asus ZenWatch, Moto360)
Android Wear 5.0x Compliant

Watch face features:
★ Time (Analog and Digital dial)
★ Customizable text logos in background (via companion app)
★ AM/PM selector (via companion app)
★ Date, day
★ Dimmed mode almost the same as normal view

More
• Visit our exclusive Android Wear faces collection for Android Wear on the Play Store
• Please let us know if you like to have any other faces (analog, digital or both) to be added to our selection.
Designed and crafted in Italy by Stefano&Riccardo
comments: Goodlooking, cheap, customizable texts (remove BL3CK and write down your name !)... I'm a fan ! However, I would appreciate if we could see the oncoming watch alarm displayed on the watchface....

Another excellent face from BL3CK I like their other face called Porto a little more, but this one is still worthy. Elegant and simple, it makes the watch look like a real watch. Easy on the battery as well.
The watch hands and back face seem a bit fuzzy on the edges on my Moto 360.
